scenarios.name: At the Restaurant
scenarios.description: A conversation between a customer and a waiter at a restaurant, ordering food and asking about the menu.

scenarios.name: At the Airport
scenarios.description: A conversation between a traveler and an airline agent at the airport, discussing flight details and check-in procedures.

scenarios.name: At the Hotel
scenarios.description: A conversation between a guest and a hotel receptionist, checking in to a hotel and asking about amenities.

scenarios.name: At the Doctor's Office
scenarios.description: A conversation between a patient and a doctor, discussing symptoms and receiving medical advice.

scenarios.name: At the Grocery Store
scenarios.description: A conversation between a shopper and a cashier at a grocery store, checking out items and discussing prices.

scenarios.name: At the Bank
scenarios.description: A conversation between a customer and a bank teller, discussing account transactions and banking services.

scenarios.name: At the Post Office
scenarios.description: A conversation between a customer and a postal worker, mailing a package and asking about shipping options.

scenarios.name: At the Train Station
scenarios.description: A conversation between a passenger and a ticket agent at a train station, buying tickets and asking about train schedules.

scenarios.name: At the Job Interview
scenarios.description: A conversation between a job applicant and an interviewer, discussing qualifications and answering interview questions.

scenarios.name: At the University
scenarios.description: A conversation between a student and a professor, discussing coursework and asking for academic advice.
